PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09192020-11-20,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC,  NCC,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectOrder approving the acquisition of real properties by the National Capital Commission from the City of Ottawa
PrecisOrder (1) approving the ACQUISITION by the National Capital Commission from the City of Ottawa of the following: (i) real property located at 506 Wellington Street, in Ottawa, Ontario, referred to as the Garden of the Provinces and Territories Parcel; (ii) real property without civic address, adjacent to Woodroffe Avenue, in Ottawa, Ontario, referred to as the Merivale Gardens Parcel; (iii) real property without civic address, adjacent to Russell Road, in Ottawa, Ontario, referred to as the Former Treadwell Road Parcel; and (2) granting by National Capital Commission the following easements, each for a period of 99 years, to the City of Ottawa: (i) over real property adjacent to Clegg Street and Fifth Avenue, in Ottawa, Ontario, to build, maintain, operate, repair and replace the Flora Footbridge; (ii) over real property, in Ottawa, Ontario, to install, maintain, operate and repair a watermain; and (iii) over real property located at 506 Wellington Street, in Ottawa, Ontario, to access and maintain City of Ottawa infrastructure.
AttachmentsAttachment
